TEXT.Italian: Premi [CTRL + R] per visualizzare/nascondere la segnalazione risorse.
TEXT.Spanish: Pulsar [CTRL + R] para activar las marcas de recursos.

TEXT.English: Press [ALT + U] to toggle the Unit Display (indicator "bubbles").
TEXT.French: Appuyez sur [ALT + U] pour afficher ou masquer les unités.
TEXT.German: Drücken Sie [ALT + U], um in die Einheiten-Marker ein- oder auszublenden.
TEXT.Italian: Premi [ALT + U] per visualizzare/nascondere la segnalazione unità.
TEXT.Spanish: Pulsar [ALT + U] para activar las marcas de unidades.

TEXT.English: To change the default camera distance, you can enable the field-of-view slider on the "Map" tab of the BUG mod menu [CTRL + ALT + O]. The slider position is remembered even if you hide the slider again.
TEXT.French: Si vous avez sélectionné plusieurs unités, vous pouvez leur donner des ordres de groupe.
TEXT.German: Um die Standardentfernung der Kamera einzustellen, können Sie im BUG-Mod-Menüs [CTRL + ALT + O] auf dem Reiter "Karte" einen Sichtfeld-Regler aktivieren. Das Spiel merkt sich die Position des Reglers, auch wenn Sie den Regler wieder deaktivieren.
TEXT.Italian: Quando più unità sono selezionate, puoi impartire ordini a tutto il gruppo...
TEXT.Spanish: Con varias unidades seleccionadas, se pueden dar órdenes de grupo que éstas llevarán a cabo a la vez.

TEXT.English: (AdvCiv) Your spy units can investigate rival cities again, but unlike in "Warlords" and Civ 4, a mission cost needs to be paid.
TEXT.French: (AdvCiv) Vos unités d'espionnage peuvent enquêter sur les villes rivales, mais contrairement aux "Warlords" et Civ 4, un coût de mission doit être payé.
TEXT.German: (AdvCiv) Ihre Spione haben nun wieder die Fähigkeit, gegnerische Städte zu erkunden; aber anders als in "Warlords" und Civ 4 fallen dabei Missionskosten an.
TEXT.Italian: (AdvCiv) Le tue unità spia possono indagare su città rivali, ma a differenza di "Warlords" e Civ 4, un costo di missione deve essere pagato.
TEXT.Spanish: (AdvCiv) Tus unidades de espionaje pueden investigar ciudades rivales, pero a diferencia de "Warlords" y Civ 4, se debe pagar un costo de misión.

TEXT.English: (AdvCiv) When any member of your team is researching the same technology as you are, you both receive a 10% penalty on your research rates. Still, when a particular technology is urgently needed by the team, it can make sense to research that technology together.
TEXT.French: (AdvCiv) When any member of your team is researching the same technology as you are, you both receive a 10% penalty on your research rates. Still, when a particular technology is urgently needed by the team, it can make sense to research that technology together.
TEXT.German: (AdvCiv) Ihre Forschungsrate wird um 10% reduziert, wenn eines Ihrer Team-Mitglieder an der gleichen Technologie forscht wie Sie. Wenn das Team eine bestimmte Technologie dringend benötigt, kann es sich trotzdem lohnen, gemeinsam an einer Technologie zu forschen.
TEXT.Italian: (AdvCiv) When any member of your team is researching the same technology as you are, you both receive a 10% penalty on your research rates. Still, when a particular technology is urgently needed by the team, it can make sense to research that technology together.
TEXT.Spanish: (AdvCiv) When any member of your team is researching the same technology as you are, you both receive a 10% penalty on your research rates. Still, when a particular technology is urgently needed by the team, it can make sense to research that technology together.

TEXT.English: (AdvCiv) To see the culture percentages of unowned tiles, hold down [Shift] or enable "Always Show Tile Culture" on the "Map" tab of the BUG menu.
TEXT.French: (AdvCiv) To see the culture percentages of unowned tiles, hold down [Shift] or enable "Always Show Tile Culture" on the "Map" tab of the BUG menu.
TEXT.German: (AdvCiv) Die Kulturanteile auf neutralen Feldern lassen sich mit der Umschalttaste einblenden, oder über die Option "Kultur stets anzeigen" auf dem Reiter "Karte" im BUG-Menü.
TEXT.Italian: (AdvCiv) To see the culture percentages of unowned tiles, hold down [Shift] or enable "Always Show Tile Culture" on the "Map" tab of the BUG menu.
TEXT.Spanish: (AdvCiv) To see the culture percentages of unowned tiles, hold down [Shift] or enable "Always Show Tile Culture" on the "Map" tab of the BUG menu.

TEXT.English: When more than one of your cities is able to work a tile, the game assigns that tile to the closest city. You can override this by opening the screen of another city and left-clicking the tile. Right-click the tile to undo the assignment.
TEXT.French: When more than one of your cities is able to work a tile, the game assigns that tile to the closest city. You can override this by opening the screen of another city and left-clicking the tile. Right-click the tile to undo the assignment.
TEXT.German: Wenn mehrere Ihrer Städte dasselbe Geländefeld bearbeiten können, wird das Feld automatisch der nächstgelegenen Stadt zugewiesen. Um das Feld manuell einer anderen Stadt zuzuweisen, öffnen Sie den Bildschirm dieser Stadt und klicken Sie dort auf das Feld. Mit einem Rechtsklick können Sie die Zuweisung wieder zurücknehmen.
TEXT.Italian: When more than one of your cities is able to work a tile, the game assigns that tile to the closest city. You can override this by opening the screen of another city and left-clicking the tile. Right-click the tile to undo the assignment.
TEXT.Spanish: When more than one of your cities is able to work a tile, the game assigns that tile to the closest city. You can override this by opening the screen of another city and left-clicking the tile. Right-click the tile to undo the assignment.

TEXT.English: Good things come to spies who wait. Leaving a spy on a tile will reduce the costs of all Espionage Missions performed in that tile. If you fortify a Spy in a foreign tile, it will wake up once mission costs are maximally reduced.
TEXT.French: Un espion patient est toujours récompensé. Si vous laissez un espion sur une case, cela réduira le coût de toutes les missions d'espionnage lancées contre les éléments dans cette case. Si vous laissez un espion dans une ville étrangère, vos missions dans cette ville vous coûteront donc bien moins cher.
TEXT.German: Gut Ding will Weile haben - das gilt auch für Spione. Je länger sich ein Spion auf einem Geländefeld aufhält, desto geringer werden die Kosten für Spionagemissionen auf diesem Feld. Wenn Sie einen Spion auf einem gegnerischen Feld verschanzen, meldet er sich, wenn die Missionskosten maximal gesenkt sind.
TEXT.Italian: La spia migliore è quella che sa aspettare. Lasciando una spia su una casella riduce i costi di tutte le missioni di spionaggio verso quella casella. Perciò, lasciando una spia in una città nemica, le missioni verso di questa costeranno meno.
TEXT.Spanish: Los espías que saben esperar tienen sus ventajas. Dejar un espía en una casilla reducirá los costes de todas las misiones de espionaje realizadas contra los objetos de dicha casilla. Por tanto, dejar un espía en una ciudad enemiga abaratará significativamente el coste de tus misiones en dicha ciudad.

TEXT.English: (K-Mod) Your vassals will join you in preparing for war if you inform them of your war plans through "Let's discuss something else." You can also tell them to abandon their preparations.
TEXT.French: (K-Mod) Your vassals will join you in preparing for war if you inform them of your war plans through "Let's discuss something else." You can also tell them to abandon their preparations.
TEXT.German: (K-Mod) Wenn Sie Ihre Vasallenstaaten über einen geplanten Krieg in Kenntnis setzen, werden diese verstärkt Militäreinheiten produzieren. Sie finden diese Option unter "Reden wir über etwas anderes".
TEXT.Italian: (K-Mod) Your vassals will join you in preparing for war if you inform them of your war plans through "Let's discuss something else." You can also tell them to abandon their preparations.
TEXT.Spanish: (K-Mod) Your vassals will join you in preparing for war if you inform them of your war plans through "Let's discuss something else." You can also tell them to abandon their preparations.

TEXT.English: To cancel the missions of all your Workers, select one of them and click the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cancel Mission[COLOR_REVERT] button while holding down the [ALT] key.
TEXT.French: Pour annuler tous les ordres des Ouvriers, sélectionnez 1 ouvrier avec des ordres, et en gardant [ALT] enfoncé, cliquez le bouton pour annuler les ordres.
TEXT.German: Um alle Bautrupp-Missionen abzubrechen, wählen Sie einen einzelnen Bautrupp aus und klicken Sie bei gedrückter [ALT]-Taste auf die "Abbrechen"-Schaltfläche.
TEXT.Italian: Per cancellare velocemente tutti gli ordini dei lavoratori, selezionane uno che abbia ordini attivi, tieni premuto il tasto [ALT] e clicca il pulsante di cancellazione degli ordini.
TEXT.Spanish: To cancel the missions of all your Workers, select one of them and click the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cancel Mission[COLOR_REVERT] button while holding down the [ALT] key.

TEXT.English: (AdvCiv) Your AI rivals will not consider proposals for a trade embargo so long as you have trades with the target of the embargo. In contrast, you can always tell your vassals to stop trading with any target.
TEXT.French: (AdvCiv) Your AI rivals will not consider proposals for a trade embargo so long as you have trades with the target of the embargo. In contrast, you can always tell your vassals to stop trading with any target.
TEXT.German: (AdvCiv) Ihre KI-Gegner lassem sich nicht von einem Handelsembargo überzeugen, solange Sie selbst mit dem Ziel des Embargos Handel treiben. Ihre Vasallen können Sie allerdings jederzeit anweisen, den Handel mit einem Gegner einzustellen.
TEXT.Italian: (AdvCiv) Your AI rivals will not consider proposals for a trade embargo so long as you have trades with the target of the embargo. In contrast, you can always tell your vassals to stop trading with any target.
TEXT.Spanish: (AdvCiv) Your AI rivals will not consider proposals for a trade embargo so long as you have trades with the target of the embargo. In contrast, you can always tell your vassals to stop trading with any target.
